```{r load-packages, include=FALSE}
#libraries to be loaded
library(LightLogR)
#these packages are needed for the examples as shown below.
library(flextable)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(gtsummary)
```

#### Load the dataset

```{r}
path <- "D:/Thesis/106/all_files/"
files <- list.files(path, full.names = TRUE)
#show how many files are listes
length(files)

tz <- "Europe/Berlin"
pattern <- "^(\\d{3})"
data <- import$ActLumus(files, tz = tz, auto.id = pattern, dst_adjustment = TRUE, 
                  auto.plot = TRUE, silent = TRUE, remove_duplicates = TRUE)

```

#### fill gap

```{r}
#data %>% gap_finder()
#data %>% count_difftime()
# data1 <- data %>% aggregate_Datetime(unit = "60 sec")
# data1 %>% gap_finder()
# data1 %>% count_difftime()


gap.data <- 
      data %>% 
      gap_finder(
        Datetime.colname = Datetime,
        gap.data = TRUE, silent = TRUE, epoch = "60 sec") %>% 
      dplyr::group_by(gap.id, .add = TRUE) %>% 
      dplyr::filter(dplyr::n() > 1)
    
    there_are_gaps <- nrow(gap.data) > 0
    
    if(there_are_gaps) {
      gap2 <- 
        gap.data %>% 
        dplyr::summarize(
          start = min(Datetime), end = max(Datetime))
    }

```

#### Extract only one day

```{r}
data1$date <- as.Date(data1$Datetime,tz=tz)
data1$month <- month(data1$date)
data_Id101 <- data1 %>% filter(Id == 106 & date == "2024-07-11")
data_Id101 %>% gg_day()

```



#### Time above threshold

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
duration_above_threshold(
  Light.vector = data_Id101$MEDI,
  Time.vector = data_Id101$Datetime,
  threshold = 250,
  epoch = "dominant.epoch",
  na.rm = FALSE
)

```

#### Time above threshold for month

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
for (x in unique(data1$month)) {
  data_month = data1 %>% filter(month == x) %>%
  dplyr::reframe(duration_above_threshold(MEDI, Datetime, threshold = 250, as.df = TRUE))
  
  print(paste("time above threshold for month", x))
  print(data_month)
}

```


#### Brightest 10 hours of the day

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
brightest101 = bright_dark_period(
  Light.vector = data_Id101$MEDI,
  Time.vector = data_Id101$Datetime,
  as.df = TRUE,
  timespan = "10 hours",
  epoch = "dominant.epoch"
)
brightest101
Onset <- brightest101$brightest_10h_onset
Offset <- brightest101$brightest_10h_offset

data_Id101 %>% 
  gg_day(aes_col = Datetime >= Onset & Datetime <= Offset) +
  guides(color = "none")
```


#### Brightest 10hour per month

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
for (x in unique(data1$month)) {
```

#### Darkest 10 hours of the day with loop

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
M10 <- 
bright_dark_period(
  Light.vector = data_Id101$MEDI,
  Time.vector = data_Id101$Datetime,
  as.df = TRUE,
  period = "darkest",
  timespan = "10 hours",
  loop = TRUE
)
M10
Onset <- M10$darkest_10h_onset
Offset <- M10$darkest_10h_offset

data_Id101 %>% 
  gg_day(aes_col = Datetime >= Onset | Datetime <= Offset) +
  guides(color = "none")
```
